about_the_game:
You will play the role of a recently graduated young man with poor talent who has undergone soul transmigration to a parallel dimension that is being invaded by beasts from another world. His parents have just passed away, his business has gone bankrupt, and his house is about to be repossessed—a catastrophic start. However, you possess the standard "golden finger" of a time traveler, allowing you to acquire a cultivation system different from this world. You can ignore talent, progress faster than others, and possess unparalleled strength, leading the humans of this world to resist the beast invasion.

Players can cultivate the following systems:

  • ‌The Knight System‌, divided into Knight Apprentice, Junior Knight, Intermediate Knight, Senior Knight, and Grand Knight.

  • ‌The Mage System‌, divided into Mage Apprentice, Junior Mage, Intermediate Mage, Senior Mage, Super Mage, Grand Mage, Mage Saint, and Mage God.

  • ‌The Martial Arts System‌, divided into Non-Proficient, Third-Rate, Second-Rate, First-Rate, Innate, Master, Grand Master, and Unparalleled.

  • ‌The Cultivation System‌, divided into Body Tempering Stage, Qi Refining Stage, Foundation Building Stage, Golden Dan Stage, Yuan Ying Stage, Spirit Transformation Stage, Soul Departure Stage, Spirit Division Stage, Cave Emptiness Stage, Body Integration Stage, Great Accomplishment Stage, and Tribulation Transcendence Stage.

The natives follow a Qi and Blood Martial Arts System that differs from the above, and the beasts have a similar system. Players can also capture pets to assist them in battle.‌
detailed_description:
You will play the role of a recently graduated young man with poor talent who has undergone soul transmigration to a parallel dimension that is being invaded by beasts from another world. His parents have just passed away, his business has gone bankrupt, and his house is about to be repossessed—a catastrophic start. However, you possess the standard "golden finger" of a time traveler, allowing you to acquire a cultivation system different from this world. You can ignore talent, progress faster than others, and possess unparalleled strength, leading the humans of this world to resist the beast invasion.

Players can cultivate the following systems:

  • ‌The Knight System‌, divided into Knight Apprentice, Junior Knight, Intermediate Knight, Senior Knight, and Grand Knight.

  • ‌The Mage System‌, divided into Mage Apprentice, Junior Mage, Intermediate Mage, Senior Mage, Super Mage, Grand Mage, Mage Saint, and Mage God.

  • ‌The Martial Arts System‌, divided into Non-Proficient, Third-Rate, Second-Rate, First-Rate, Innate, Master, Grand Master, and Unparalleled.

  • ‌The Cultivation System‌, divided into Body Tempering Stage, Qi Refining Stage, Foundation Building Stage, Golden Dan Stage, Yuan Ying Stage, Spirit Transformation Stage, Soul Departure Stage, Spirit Division Stage, Cave Emptiness Stage, Body Integration Stage, Great Accomplishment Stage, and Tribulation Transcendence Stage.

The natives follow a Qi and Blood Martial Arts System that differs from the above, and the beasts have a similar system. Players can also capture pets to assist them in battle.‌
